did.unittitle: Documentary film on hearing-impaired child and his family, outtakes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Nine 16mm color moving image film and 16mm magnetic audio tape reels. Note: We do not have a copy of the finished documentary and nothing in the collection indicates a connection to Burt T. Combs or where the finished documentary might be found or the identity of any of the subjects that appear in the documentary
